ayah: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا
ayah_translit: tabaraka alladhi nazzala al-fur'qana ala abdihi liyakuna lil'alamina nadhiran
ayah_english: Blessed is He Who sent down the Criterion upon His slave that he may be to the worlds a warner

ayah: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَمۡ يَتَّخِذۡ وَلَدٗا وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ شَرِيكٞ فِي ٱلۡمُلۡكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٖ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ تَقۡدِيرٗا
ayah_translit: alladhi lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi walam yattakhidh waladan walam yakun lahu sharikun fi al-mul'ki wakhalaqa kulla shayin faqaddarahu taqdiran
ayah_english: The One Who to Him (belongs) (the) dominion (of) the heavens and the earth and not He has taken a son and not He has for Him a partner in the dominion and He (has) created every thing and determined it (with) determination

ayah: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَمۡ يَتَّخِذۡ وَلَدٗا وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ شَرِيكٞ فِي ٱلۡمُلۡكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٖ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ تَقۡدِيرٗا

ayah: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةٗ لَّا يَخۡلُقُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ وَلَا يَمۡلِكُونَ لِأَنفُسِهِمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا نَفۡعٗا وَلَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مَوۡتٗا وَلَا حَيَوٰةٗ وَلَا نُشُورٗا
ayah_translit: wa-ittakhadhu min dunihi alihatan la yakhluquna shayan wahum yukh'laquna wala yamlikuna li-anfusihim darran wala naf 'an wala yamlikuna mawtan wala hayatan wala nushuran
ayah_english: Yet they have taken besides Him besides Him gods not they create anything while they are created and not they possess for themselves any harm and not any benefit and not they control death and not life and not resurrection

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفۡكٌ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُ وَأَعَانَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِ قَوۡمٌ ءَاخَرُونَۖ فَقَدۡ جَآءُو ظُلۡمٗا وَزُورٗا
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina kafaru in hadha illa if'kun if'tarahu wa-a'anahu alayhi qawmun akharuna faqad jau zul'man wazuran
ayah_english: And say those who disbelieve Not this (is) but a lie he invented it and helped him at it people other But verily they (have) produced an injustice and a lie

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفۡكٌ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُ وَأَعَانَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِ قَوۡمٌ ءَاخَرُونَۖ فَقَدۡ جَآءُو ظُلۡمٗا وَزُورٗا

ayah: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ ٱكۡتَتَبَهَا فَهِيَ تُمۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلٗا
ayah_translit: waqalu asatiru al-awalina ik'tatabaha fahiya tum'la alayhi buk'ratan wa-asilan
ayah_english: And they say Tales (of) the former people which he has had written and they are dictated to him morning and evening

ayah: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ ٱكۡتَتَبَهَا فَهِيَ تُمۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلٗا

ayah: قُلۡ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
ayah_translit: qul anzalahu alladhi ya'lamu al-sira fi al-samawati wal-ardi innahu kana ghafuran rahiman
ayah_english: Say Has sent it down the One Who knows the secret in the heavens and the earth Indeed He is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: وَقَالُواْ مَالِ هَٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشِي فِي ٱلۡأَسۡوَاقِ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا
ayah_translit: waqalu mali hadha al-rasuli yakulu al-ta'ama wayamshi fi al-aswaqi lawla unzila ilayhi malakun fayakuna ma'ahu nadhiran
ayah_english: And they say Why does this Messenger eat [the] food and walk in the markets Why not is sent down to him an Angel then he be with him a warner

ayah: وَقَالُواْ مَالِ هَٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشِي فِي ٱلۡأَسۡوَاقِ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا

ayah_english: And they say Why does this Messenger eat [the] food and walk in the markets Why not is sent down to him an Angel then he be with him a warner

ayah: أَوۡ يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ كَنزٌ أَوۡ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٞ يَأۡكُلُ مِنۡهَاۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلٗا مَّسۡحُورًا
ayah_translit: aw yul'qa ilayhi kanzun aw takunu lahu jannatun yakulu min'ha waqala al-zalimuna in tattabi'una illa rajulan mashuran
ayah_english: Or is delivered to him a treasure or is for him a garden he may eat from it And say the wrongdoers Not you follow but a man bewitched

ayah: أَوۡ يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ كَنزٌ أَوۡ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٞ يَأۡكُلُ مِنۡهَاۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلٗا مَّسۡحُورًا

ayah_english: Or is delivered to him a treasure or is for him a garden he may eat from it And say the wrongdoers Not you follow but a man bewitched

ayah: أَوۡ يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ كَنزٌ أَوۡ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٞ يَأۡكُلُ مِنۡهَاۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلٗا مَّسۡحُورًا
ayah_translit: aw yul'qa ilayhi kanzun aw takunu lahu jannatun yakulu min'ha waqala al-zalimuna in tattabi'una illa rajulan mashuran
ayah_english: Or is delivered to him a treasure or is for him a garden he may eat from it And say the wrongdoers Not you follow but a man bewitched

ayah: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا
ayah_translit: unzur kayfa darabu laka al-amthala fadallu fala yastati'una sabilan
ayah_english: See how they set forth for you the similitudes but they have gone astray so not they are able (to find) a way

ayah: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا

ayah: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيۡرٗا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكَ قُصُورَۢا
ayah_translit: tabaraka alladhi in shaa ja'ala laka khayran min dhalika jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu wayaj'al laka qusuran
ayah_english: Blessed is He Who if He willed (could have) made for you better than that gardens flow from underneath it the rivers and He (could) make for you palaces

ayah: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيۡرٗا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكَ قُصُورَۢا

ayah: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلسَّاعَةِۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا
ayah_translit: bal kadhabu bil-sa'ati wa-a'tadna liman kadhaba bil-sa'ati sa'iran
ayah_english: Nay they deny the Hour and We have prepared for (those) who deny the Hour a Blazing Fire

ayah: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلسَّاعَةِۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا

ayah: إِذَا رَأَتۡهُم مِّن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ سَمِعُواْ لَهَا تَغَيُّظٗا وَزَفِيرٗا
ayah_translit: idha ra-athum min makanin ba'idin sami'u laha taghayyuzan wazafiran
ayah_english: When it sees them from a place far they will hear its raging and roaring

ayah: إِذَا رَأَتۡهُم مِّن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ سَمِعُواْ لَهَا تَغَيُّظٗا وَزَفِيرٗا

ayah_translit: idha ra-athum min makanin ba'idin sami'u laha taghayyuzan wazafiran

ayah: وَإِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ مِنۡهَا مَكَانٗا ضَيِّقٗا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوۡاْ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idha ul'qu min'ha makanan dayyiqan muqarranina da'aw hunalika thuburan
ayah_english: And when they are thrown thereof (in) a place narrow bound in chains they will call there (for) destruction

ayah: وَإِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ مِنۡهَا مَكَانٗا ضَيِّقٗا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوۡاْ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورٗا

ayah_english: And when they are thrown thereof (in) a place narrow bound in chains they will call there (for) destruction

ayah: لَّا تَدۡعُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ثُبُورٗا وَٰحِدٗا وَٱدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا كَثِيرٗا
ayah_translit: la tad'u al-yawma thuburan wahidan wa-id'u thuburan kathiran
ayah_english: (Do) not call this day (for) destruction one but call (for) destructions many

ayah: لَّا تَدۡعُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ثُبُورٗا وَٰحِدٗا وَٱدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا كَثِيرٗا

ayah: قُلۡ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ جَنَّةُ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ ٱلَّتِي وُعِدَ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَۚ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَمَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: qul adhalika khayrun am jannatu al-khul'di allati wu'ida al-mutaquna kanat lahum jazaan wamasiran
ayah_english: Say Is that better or Garden (of) Eternity which is promised (to) the righteous It will be for them a reward and destination

ayah: لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَٰلِدِينَۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعۡدٗا مَّسۡـُٔولٗا
ayah_translit: lahum fiha ma yashauna khalidina kana ala rabbika wa'dan masulan
ayah_english: For them therein (is) whatever they wish they will abide forever It is on your Lord a promise requested

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقُولُ ءَأَنتُمۡ أَضۡلَلۡتُمۡ عِبَادِي هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَمۡ هُمۡ ضَلُّواْ ٱلسَّبِيلَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yahshuruhum wama ya'buduna min duni al-lahi fayaqulu a-antum adlaltum ibadi haulai am hum dallu al-sabila
ayah_english: And (the) Day He will gather them and what they worship besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah and He will say Did you [you] mislead My slaves these or they went astray (from) the way

ayah: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنۢبَغِي لَنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ وَلَٰكِن مَّتَّعۡتَهُمۡ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَسُواْ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمَۢا بُورٗا
ayah_translit: qalu sub'hanaka ma kana yanbaghi lana an nattakhidha min dunika min awliyaa walakin matta'tahum waabaahum hatta nasu al-dhik'ra wakanu qawman buran
ayah_english: They say Glory be to You Not it was proper it was proper for us that we take besides You besides You any protectors But You gave them comforts and their forefathers until they forgot the Message and became a people ruined

ayah: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنۢبَغِي لَنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ وَلَٰكِن مَّتَّعۡتَهُمۡ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَسُواْ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمَۢا بُورٗا

ayah_english: They say Glory be to You Not it was proper it was proper for us that we take besides You besides You any protectors But You gave them comforts and their forefathers until they forgot the Message and became a people ruined

ayah: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسۡتَطِيعُونَ صَرۡفٗا وَلَا نَصۡرٗاۚ وَمَن يَظۡلِم مِّنكُمۡ نُذِقۡهُ عَذَابٗا كَبِيرٗا
ayah_translit: faqad kadhabukum bima taquluna fama tastati'una sarfan wala nasran waman yazlim minkum nudhiq'hu adhaban kabiran
ayah_english: So verily they deny you in what you say so not you are able (to) avert and not (to) help And whoever does wrong among you We will make him taste a punishment great

ayah: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ لَيَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡوَاقِۗ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَعۡضَكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٖ فِتۡنَةً أَتَصۡبِرُونَۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: wama arsalna qablaka mina al-mur'salina illa innahum layakuluna al-ta'ama wayamshuna fi al-aswaqi waja'alna ba'dakum liba'din fit'natan atasbiruna wakana rabbuka basiran
ayah_english: And not We sent before you any Messengers but indeed they [surely] ate food and walked in the markets And We have made some of you for others a trial will you have patience And is your Lord All-Seer

ayah: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ لَيَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡوَاقِۗ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَعۡضَكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٖ فِتۡنَةً أَتَصۡبِرُونَۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرٗا

ayah: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ لَيَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡوَاقِۗ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَعۡضَكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٖ فِتۡنَةً أَتَصۡبِرُونَۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرٗا

ayah_translit: wama arsalna qablaka mina al-mur'salina illa innahum layakuluna al-ta'ama wayamshuna fi al-aswaqi waja'alna ba'dakum liba'din fit'natan atasbiruna wakana rabbuka basiran
ayah_english: And not We sent before you any Messengers but indeed they [surely] ate food and walked in the markets And We have made some of you for others a trial will you have patience And is your Lord All-Seer

ayah: ۞وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوۡ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَاۗ لَقَدِ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَعَتَوۡ عُتُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina la yarjuna liqaana lawla unzila alayna al-malaikatu aw nara rabbana laqadi is'takbaru fi anfusihim wa'ataw utuwwan kabiran
ayah_english: And said those who (do) not expect (the) meeting with Us Why not are sent down to us the Angels or we see our Lord Indeed they have become arrogant within themselves and (become) insolent (with) insolence great

ayah: ۞وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوۡ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَاۗ لَقَدِ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَعَتَوۡ عُتُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا

ayah: ۞وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوۡ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَاۗ لَقَدِ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَعَتَوۡ عُتُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina la yarjuna liqaana lawla unzila alayna al-malaikatu aw nara rabbana laqadi is'takbaru fi anfusihim wa'ataw utuwwan kabiran
ayah_english: And said those who (do) not expect (the) meeting with Us Why not are sent down to us the Angels or we see our Lord Indeed they have become arrogant within themselves and (become) insolent (with) insolence great

ayah: ۞وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوۡ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَاۗ لَقَدِ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَعَتَوۡ عُتُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشۡرَىٰ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجۡرٗا مَّحۡجُورٗا
ayah_translit: yawma yarawna al-malaikata la bush'ra yawma-idhin lil'muj'rimina wayaquluna hij'ran mahjuran
ayah_english: (The) Day they see the Angels no glad tidings (will be) that Day for the criminals and they will say A partition forbidden

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشۡرَىٰ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجۡرٗا مَّحۡجُورٗا

ayah: وَقَدِمۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُواْ مِنۡ عَمَلٖ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هَبَآءٗ مَّنثُورًا
ayah_translit: waqadim'na ila ma amilu min amalin faja'alnahu habaan manthuran
ayah_english: And We will proceed to whatever they did of (the) deed(s) and We will make them (as) dust dispersed

ayah_english: And We will proceed to whatever they did of (the) deed(s) and We will make them (as) dust dispersed

ayah: أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَيۡرٞ مُّسۡتَقَرّٗا وَأَحۡسَنُ مَقِيلٗا
ayah_translit: ashabu al-janati yawma-idhin khayrun mus'taqarran wa-ahsanu maqilan
ayah_english: (The) companions (of) Paradise that Day (will be in) a better abode and a better resting-place

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلۡغَمَٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا
ayah_translit: wayawma tashaqqaqu al-samau bil-ghamami wanuzzila al-malaikatu tanzilan
ayah_english: And (the) Day will split open the heavens with the clouds and (will be) sent down the Angels descending

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلۡغَمَٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا

ayah: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡحَقُّ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ وَكَانَ يَوۡمًا عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرٗا
ayah_translit: al-mul'ku yawma-idhin al-haqu lilrrahmani wakana yawman ala al-kafirina asiran
ayah_english: The Sovereignty that Day (will be) truly for the Most Gracious And (it will) be a Day for the disbelievers difficult

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيۡهِ يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي ٱتَّخَذۡتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلٗا
ayah_translit: wayawma ya'addu al-zalimu ala yadayhi yaqulu yalaytani ittakhadhtu ma'a al-rasuli sabilan
ayah_english: And (the) Day will bite the wrongdoer [on] his hands he will say O I wish! I had taken with the Messenger a way

ayah: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا
ayah_translit: yawaylata laytani lam attakhidh fulanan khalilan
ayah_english: O woe to me! I wish not I had taken that one (as) a friend

ayah: لَّقَدۡ أَضَلَّنِي عَنِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَنِيۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولٗا
ayah_translit: laqad adallani ani al-dhik'ri ba'da idh jaani wakana al-shaytanu lil'insani khadhulan
ayah_english: Verily he led me astray from the Reminder after [when] it (had) come to me And is the Shaitaan to the man a deserter

ayah: لَّقَدۡ أَضَلَّنِي عَنِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَنِيۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولٗا

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي ٱتَّخَذُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورٗا
ayah_translit: waqala al-rasulu yarabbi inna qawmi ittakhadhu hadha al-qur'ana mahjuran
ayah_english: And said the Messenger O my Lord! Indeed my people took this the Quran (as) a forsaken thing

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيٗا وَنَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: wakadhalika ja'alna likulli nabiyyin aduwwan mina al-muj'rimina wakafa birabbika hadiyan wanasiran
ayah_english: And thus We have made for every Prophet an enemy among the criminals But sufficient is your Lord (as) a Guide and a Helper

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ جُمۡلَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَۖ وَرَتَّلۡنَٰهُ تَرۡتِيلٗا
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina kafaru lawla nuzzila alayhi al-qur'anu jum'latan wahidatan kadhalika linuthabbita bihi fuadaka warattalnahu tartilan
ayah_english: And said those who disbelieve Why not was revealed to him the Quran all at once all at once Thus that We may strengthen thereby your heart and We have recited it (with distinct) recitation

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ جُمۡلَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَۖ وَرَتَّلۡنَٰهُ تَرۡتِيلٗا

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ جُمۡلَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَۖ وَرَتَّلۡنَٰهُ تَرۡتِيلٗا

ayah: وَلَا يَأۡتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَحۡسَنَ تَفۡسِيرًا
ayah_translit: wala yatunaka bimathalin illa ji'naka bil-haqi wa-ahsana tafsiran
ayah_english: And not they come to you with an example but We bring you the truth and (the) best explanation

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحۡشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ شَرّٞ مَّكَانٗا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلٗا
ayah_translit: alladhina yuh'sharuna ala wujuhihim ila jahannama ulaika sharrun makanan wa-adallu sabilan
ayah_english: Those who will be gathered on their faces to Hell those (are the) worst (in) position and most astray (from the) way

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ وَزِيرٗا
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba waja'alna ma'ahu akhahu haruna waziran
ayah_english: And verily We gave Musa the Scripture and We appointed with him his brother Harun (as) an assistant

ayah: فَقُلۡنَا ٱذۡهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرۡنَٰهُمۡ تَدۡمِيرٗا
ayah_translit: faqul'na idh'haba ila al-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayatina fadammarnahum tadmiran
ayah_english: Then We said Go both of you to the people those who have denied Our Signs Then We destroyed them (with) destruction

ayah: فَقُلۡنَا ٱذۡهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرۡنَٰهُمۡ تَدۡمِيرٗا

ayah: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ لَّمَّا كَذَّبُواْ ٱلرُّسُلَ أَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ لِلنَّاسِ ءَايَةٗۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا
ayah_translit: waqawma nuhin lamma kadhabu al-rusula aghraqnahum waja'alnahum lilnnasi ayatan wa-a'tadna lilzzalimina adhaban aliman
ayah_english: And (the) people (of) Nuh when they denied the Messengers We drowned them and We made them for mankind a sign And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a punishment painful

ayah: وَعَادٗا وَثَمُودَاْ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونَۢا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرٗا
ayah_translit: wa'adan wathamuda wa-ashaba al-rasi waqurunan bayna dhalika kathiran
ayah_english: And Ad and Thamud and (the) dwellers (of) Ar-rass and generations between that many

ayah_translit: wakullan darabna lahu al-amthala wakullan tabbarna tatbiran

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَتَوۡاْ عَلَى ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُمۡطِرَتۡ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوۡءِۚ أَفَلَمۡ يَكُونُواْ يَرَوۡنَهَاۚ بَلۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَرۡجُونَ نُشُورٗا
ayah_translit: walaqad ataw ala al-qaryati allati um'tirat matara al-sawi afalam yakunu yarawnaha bal kanu la yarjuna nushuran
ayah_english: And verily they have come upon the town which was showered (with) a rain (of) evil Then do not they [were] see it Nay they are not expecting Resurrection

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَتَوۡاْ عَلَى ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُمۡطِرَتۡ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوۡءِۚ أَفَلَمۡ يَكُونُواْ يَرَوۡنَهَاۚ بَلۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَرۡجُونَ نُشُورٗا

ayah: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا
ayah_translit: wa-idha ra-awka in yattakhidhunaka illa huzuwan ahadha alladhi ba'atha al-lahu rasulan
ayah_english: And when they see you not they take you except (in) mockery Is this the one whom Allah has sent Allah has sent (as) a Messenger

ayah: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا

ayah_english: And when they see you not they take you except (in) mockery Is this the one whom Allah has sent Allah has sent (as) a Messenger

ayah: إِن كَادَ لَيُضِلُّنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا لَوۡلَآ أَن صَبَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهَاۚ وَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ حِينَ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ مَنۡ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
ayah_translit: in kada layudilluna an alihatina lawla an sabarna alayha wasawfa ya'lamuna hina yarawna al-'adhaba man adallu sabilan
ayah_english: He would have almost He would have almost [surely] misled us from our gods if not that we had been steadfast to them And soon will know when they will see the punishment who (is) more astray (from the) way

ayah_translit: in kada layudilluna an alihatina lawla an sabarna alayha wasawfa ya'lamuna hina yarawna al-'adhaba man adallu sabilan

ayah: أَرَءَيۡتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِ وَكِيلًا
ayah_translit: ara-ayta mani ittakhadha ilahahu hawahu afa-anta takunu alayhi wakilan
ayah_english: Have you seen (one) who takes (as) his god his own desire Then would you be over him a guardian

ayah: أَمۡ تَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ يَسۡمَعُونَ أَوۡ يَعۡقِلُونَۚ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا كَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ بَلۡ هُمۡ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
ayah_translit: am tahsabu anna aktharahum yasma'una aw ya'qiluna in hum illa kal-an'ami bal hum adallu sabilan
ayah_english: Or do you think that most of them hear or understand Not they (are) except like cattle Nay they (are) more astray (from the) way

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيۡفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنٗا ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَا ٱلشَّمۡسَ عَلَيۡهِ دَلِيلٗا
ayah_translit: alam tara ila rabbika kayfa madda al-zila walaw shaa laja'alahu sakinan thumma ja'alna al-shamsa alayhi dalilan
ayah_english: Do you not see [to] your Lord how He extends the shadow And if He willed surely He (could) have made it stationary Then We made the sun for it an indication

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيۡفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنٗا ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَا ٱلشَّمۡسَ عَلَيۡهِ دَلِيلٗا

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ لِبَاسٗا وَٱلنَّوۡمَ سُبَاتٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورٗا
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-layla libasan wal-nawma subatan waja'ala al-nahara nushuran
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who made for you the night (as) a covering and the sleep a rest and made the day a resurrection

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ لِبَاسٗا وَٱلنَّوۡمَ سُبَاتٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورٗا

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ طَهُورٗا
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi arsala al-riyaha bush'ran bayna yaday rahmatihi wa-anzalna mina al-samai maan tahuran
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who sends the winds (as) glad tidings before before His Mercy and We send down from the sky water pure

ayah: لِّنُحۡـِۧيَ بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗا وَنُسۡقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقۡنَآ أَنۡعَٰمٗا وَأَنَاسِيَّ كَثِيرٗا
ayah_translit: linuh'yiya bihi baldatan maytan wanus'qiyahu mimma khalaqna an'aman wa-anasiyya kathiran
ayah_english: That We may give life thereby (to) a land dead and We give drink thereof (to those) We created cattle and men many

ayah: لِّنُحۡـِۧيَ بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗا وَنُسۡقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقۡنَآ أَنۡعَٰمٗا وَأَنَاسِيَّ كَثِيرٗا

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَٰهُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا
ayah_translit: walaqad sarrafnahu baynahum liyadhakkaru fa-aba aktharu al-nasi illa kufuran
ayah_english: And verily We have distributed it among them that they may remember but refuse most (of) the people except disbelief

ayah: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا

ayah_translit: fala tuti'i al-kafirina wajahid'hum bihi jihadan kabiran

ayah: ۞وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي مَرَجَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ هَٰذَا عَذۡبٞ فُرَاتٞ وَهَٰذَا مِلۡحٌ أُجَاجٞ وَجَعَلَ بَيۡنَهُمَا بَرۡزَخٗا وَحِجۡرٗا مَّحۡجُورٗا
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi maraja al-bahrayni hadha adhbun furatun wahadha mil'hun ujajun waja'ala baynahuma barzakhan wahij'ran mahjuran
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who (has) released the two seas [this] (one) palatable and sweet and [this] (one) salty (and) bitter and He has made between them a barrier and a partition forbidden

ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who (has) released the two seas [this] (one) palatable and sweet and [this] (one) salty (and) bitter and He has made between them a barrier and a partition forbidden

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ بَشَرٗا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبٗا وَصِهۡرٗاۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرٗا
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi khalaqa mina al-mai basharan faja'alahu nasaban wasih'ran wakana rabbuka qadiran
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who has created from the water human being and has made (for) him blood relationship and marriage relationship And is your Lord All-Powerful

ayah: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمۡ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمۡۗ وَكَانَ ٱلۡكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرٗا
ayah_translit: waya'buduna min duni al-lahi ma la yanfa'uhum wala yadurruhum wakana al-kafiru ala rabbihi zahiran
ayah_english: But they worship besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah what not profits them not profits them and not harms them and is the disbeliever against his Lord a helper

ayah: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا
ayah_translit: wama arsalnaka illa mubashiran wanadhiran
ayah_english: And not We sent you except (as) a bearer of glad tidings and a warner

ayah: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا
ayah_translit: qul ma asalukum alayhi min ajrin illa man shaa an yattakhidha ila rabbihi sabilan
ayah_english: Say Not I ask (of) you for it any payment except (that) whoever wills (that) whoever wills to take to his Lord a way

ayah: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا

ayah: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱلۡحَيِّ ٱلَّذِي لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِهِۦۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا
ayah_translit: watawakkal ala al-hayi alladhi la yamutu wasabbih bihamdihi wakafa bihi bidhunubi ibadihi khabiran
ayah_english: And put your trust in the Ever-Living the One Who does not die does not die and glorify with His Praise And sufficient is He regarding the sins (of) His slaves All-Aware

ayah: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱلۡحَيِّ ٱلَّذِي لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِهِۦۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا

ayah: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ فَسۡـَٔلۡ بِهِۦ خَبِيرٗا
ayah_translit: alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi al-rahmanu fasal bihi khabiran
ayah_english: The One Who created the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between them in six periods then He established Himself over the Throne the Most Gracious so ask Him (as He is) All-Aware

ayah: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ فَسۡـَٔلۡ بِهِۦ خَبِيرٗا

ayah: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ فَسۡـَٔلۡ بِهِۦ خَبِيرٗا

ayah_english: The One Who created the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between them in six periods then He established Himself over the Throne the Most Gracious so ask Him (as He is) All-Aware

ayah: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ قَالُواْ وَمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ أَنَسۡجُدُ لِمَا تَأۡمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمۡ نُفُورٗا۩
ayah_translit: wa-idha qila lahumu us'judu lilrrahmani qalu wama al-rahmanu anasjudu lima tamuruna wazadahum nufuran
ayah_english: And when it is said to them Prostrate to the Most Gracious They say And what (is) the Most Gracious Should we prostrate to what you order us And it increases them (in) aversion

ayah: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ قَالُواْ وَمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ أَنَسۡجُدُ لِمَا تَأۡمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمۡ نُفُورٗا۩

ayah: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجٗا وَقَمَرٗا مُّنِيرٗا
ayah_translit: tabaraka alladhi ja'ala fi al-samai burujan waja'ala fiha sirajan waqamaran muniran
ayah_english: Blessed is He Who has placed in the skies constellations and has placed therein a lamp and a moon shining

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلۡفَةٗ لِّمَنۡ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوۡ أَرَادَ شُكُورٗا
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi ja'ala al-layla wal-nahara khil'fatan liman arada an yadhakkara aw arada shukuran
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who made the night and the day (in) succession for whoever desires to remember or desires to be thankful

ayah: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمۡشُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هَوۡنٗا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا
ayah_translit: wa'ibadu al-rahmani alladhina yamshuna ala al-ardi hawnan wa-idha khatabahumu al-jahiluna qalu salaman
ayah_english: And (the) slaves (of) the Most Gracious (are) those who walk on the earth (in) humbleness and when address them the ignorant ones they say Peace

ayah: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمۡشُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هَوۡنٗا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمۡ سُجَّدٗا وَقِيَٰمٗا
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina yabituna lirabbihim sujjadan waqiyaman
ayah_english: And those who spend (the) night before their Lord prostrating and standing

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصۡرِفۡ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina yaquluna rabbana is'rif anna adhaba jahannama inna adhabaha kana gharaman
ayah_english: And those who say Our Lord! Avert from us the punishment (of) Hell Indeed its punishment is inseparable

ayah: إِنَّهَا سَآءَتۡ مُسۡتَقَرّٗا وَمُقَامٗا
ayah_translit: innaha saat mus'taqarran wamuqaman
ayah_english: Indeed it (is) an evil abode and resting place

ayah_translit: wa-alladhina idha anfaqu lam yus'rifu walam yaqturu wakana bayna dhalika qawaman

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدۡعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقۡتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفۡسَ ٱلَّتِي حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا يَزۡنُونَۚ وَمَن يَفۡعَلۡ ذَٰلِكَ يَلۡقَ أَثَامٗا
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina la yad'una ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara wala yaqtuluna al-nafsa allati harrama al-lahu illa bil-haqi wala yaznuna waman yaf 'al dhalika yalqa athaman
ayah_english: And those who (do) not invoke with Allah god another and (do) not [they] kill the soul which Allah has forbidden Allah has forbidden except by right and (do) not commit adultery And whoever does that will meet a penalty

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدۡعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقۡتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفۡسَ ٱلَّتِي حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا يَزۡنُونَۚ وَمَن يَفۡعَلۡ ذَٰلِكَ يَلۡقَ أَثَامٗا

ayah: يُضَٰعَفۡ لَهُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَيَخۡلُدۡ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا
ayah_translit: yuda'af lahu al-'adhabu yawma al-qiyamati wayakhlud fihi muhanan
ayah_english: Will be doubled for him the punishment (on the) Day (of) Resurrection and he will abide forever therein humiliated

ayah: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلٗا صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ حَسَنَٰتٖۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
ayah_translit: illa man taba waamana wa'amila amalan salihan fa-ulaika yubaddilu al-lahu sayyiatihim hasanatin wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
ayah_english: Except (he) who repents and believes and does righteous deeds righteous deeds then (for) those Allah will replace Allah will replace their evil deeds (with) good ones And is Allah Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشۡهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِٱللَّغۡوِ مَرُّواْ كِرَامٗا
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina la yashhaduna al-zura wa-idha marru bil-laghwi marru kiraman
ayah_english: And those who (do) not bear witness (to) the falsehood and when they pass by futility they pass (as) dignified ones

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشۡهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِٱللَّغۡوِ مَرُّواْ كِرَامٗا

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ لَمۡ يَخِرُّواْ عَلَيۡهَا صُمّٗا وَعُمۡيَانٗا
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina idha dhukkiru biayati rabbihim lam yakhirru alayha summan wa'um'yanan
ayah_english: And those who when they are reminded of (the) Verses (of) their Lord (do) not fall upon them deaf and blind

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ لَمۡ يَخِرُّواْ عَلَيۡهَا صُمّٗا وَعُمۡيَانٗا

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبۡ لَنَا مِنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعۡيُنٖ وَٱجۡعَلۡنَا لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina yaquluna rabbana hab lana min azwajina wadhurriyyatina qurrata a'yunin wa-ij'alna lil'muttaqina imaman
ayah_english: And those who say Our Lord! Grant to us from our spouses and our offspring comfort (to) our eyes and make us for the righteous a leader

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُجۡزَوۡنَ ٱلۡغُرۡفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيُلَقَّوۡنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةٗ وَسَلَٰمًا
ayah_translit: ulaika yuj'zawna al-ghur'fata bima sabaru wayulaqqawna fiha tahiyyatan wasalaman
ayah_english: Those will be awarded the Chamber because they were patient and they will be met therein (with) greetings and peace

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُجۡزَوۡنَ ٱلۡغُرۡفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيُلَقَّوۡنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةٗ وَسَلَٰمًا
ayah_translit: ulaika yuj'zawna al-ghur'fata bima sabaru wayulaqqawna fiha tahiyyatan wasalaman
ayah_english: Those will be awarded the Chamber because they were patient and they will be met therein (with) greetings and peace

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُجۡزَوۡنَ ٱلۡغُرۡفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيُلَقَّوۡنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةٗ وَسَلَٰمًا

ayah: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ حَسُنَتۡ مُسۡتَقَرّٗا وَمُقَامٗا
ayah_translit: khalidina fiha hasunat mus'taqarran wamuqaman
ayah_english: Will abide forever in it Good (is) the settlement and a resting place

ayah: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ حَسُنَتۡ مُسۡتَقَرّٗا وَمُقَامٗا

ayah: قُلۡ مَا يَعۡبَؤُاْ بِكُمۡ رَبِّي لَوۡلَا دُعَآؤُكُمۡۖ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبۡتُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامَۢا
ayah_translit: qul ma ya'ba-u bikum rabbi lawla du'aukum faqad kadhabtum fasawfa yakunu lizaman
ayah_english: Say Not will care for you my Lord if not your prayer (is to Him) But verily you have denied so soon will be the inevitable (punishment)
